aiHints.identificationPrompt: Identify this comic from the cover. Extract: publisher, series, issue number, key storylines, character appearances.
aiHints.gradingRules: Use CGC/CBCS grading standards (0.5-10.0). Assess: spine, corners, pages, color, defects.
aiHints.valuationRules: Consider: grade, key issue status, first appearances, historical significance, market demand.
